doc.previous: Despite being promoted as an encyclopedia anyone can edit the ability to edit controversial pages is sometimes restricted due to edit wars or vandalism 6 To address criticism about restricting access while still minimizing malicious editing of those pages Wikipedia has also trialed measures such as pending changes that would open contentious articles up for more people to edit then subject their contributions to approval from more established members of the site 7 8
